target: I can do that. I'm sorry, but can you clarify your departure site? It appears it would be a location in the centre?
context: <user> Is there anything interesting to see in the centre of town? <system> In addition to architecture, colleges, and museums, we also have boat attractions, nightclubs, and theatres in the centre. <user> I would be interested in seeing some interesting architecture. <system> There are a few places, mainly churches, that have great architecture. Do you want information on any of those? <user> No thank you though. I would like information on greek restaurants that would be in the same area as the churches you suggested, please? <system> there is no greek restaurant in the centre. can we change the location? <user> Well, how about African food? <system> Bedouin is an expensive serving african food in the centre of town.<user> That sounds good, can you book 2 people at 13:30 on Tuesday. <system> Booking was successful. Reference number is : IA596HSH . Is there anything else I can do for you?<user> Yes, I'll also need a taxi to commute between the two places. I'll need to be at the restaurant by 13:30, of course. <system> Okay and where do you need the taxi to pick you up?<user> I need it to arrive before the 13:30 at the restaurant. Can you give me a contact number and the car type that will pick me up? <system>
